class_notes: The delivery format listed for this class is based on current university guidelines.  However, if there are further changes to the COVID19 guidelines for Fall 2021 or other acts beyond our control, the school reserves the right the modify the delivery method for this class.
course_description: This course reviews process analysis in detail. Process analysis is a key component of Six Sigma programs. Six Sigma is an approach for performance improvement that was made famous by GE and is currently being implemented by thousands of companies. The analytical skills you learn in this course are important to many employers and can be foundational for a career in operational performance improvement.
prerequisites: ISOM 351 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
schedule_location: Th 6:30pm-9:30pm in Goizueta Foundation Ctr W300
